TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Afalian_Lufic, title = Afalian_Lufic, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afalian_Lufic} }

S.FORM: Masalipa:Infobox person O Afalian Lufic (Holam: ;Ikilis: Afalean Lu; 1988 a miheca saka 2 a folad saka 15 a romi'ad saka) cecay mianingaya ato romadiw a tamdaw i Taywan. Taypak suli Nan'gang Kawcung a mico yap, ca Ciyukok Unhwa Daigak sowal no France Bungak hi' ato Taypak suli Ondo Gaku'in a mico yap. Na u micamol to malalifet Cawcisingkwangtataw i Pipahosoan to tilifi no Ciyukok.
